main event: One round, silver object was seen flying straight east from NW to NE for approximately five minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a baseball at arms length., The observer potentially saw a reflection from an aircraft due to the sun being directly behind them., The sighting lasted about five minutes., The object was reported to be flying at a consistent course to the east., There was speculation that this could have been an aircraft passing to the north.
